casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Elvester A. ROBINSON, Appellant. WD 79395 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: March 20, 2018 Irene Karns, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Garrick Aplin, Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division Two: James Edward Welsh, P.J., Alok Ahuja, and Anthony Rex Gabbert, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Elvester Robinson appeals his conviction on one count of first-degree child molestation ( § 566.067, RSMo Cum. Supp. 2013), following a jury trial, for which he was sentenced to life in prison with no possibility of parole for twenty-five years. We affirm. Rule 30.25(b).
